data.title: Scott Donachie on LinkedIn: #circularity #builtenvironment #sustainability
data.meta_description:
Circularity in the Built Environment is almost here! 

Join us on May 15th for a panel discussion at  Skidmore, Owings & Merrill (SOM), 7 World Trade Center.‚Ä¶
data.text:
World Environment Day Today, 5 June, we recognise World Environment Day. It is a time to reflect on the legacy we are leaving for the generations who follow us. We cannot undo what has happened before or turn back the clock, but we can make the decision today to do better. We can grow trees, revive our water sources, work to make peace with our environment and implement industry practices which bring real, positive benefits. At SKIPZ Recycling, we value our role in the circular economy - diverting construction and demolition waste away from landfill and recycling it into custom engineered building materials. These recycled materials are then channelled into civil construction and public infrastructure projects, reducing reliance on virgin construction materials. If you are interested in learning more about our Resource Recovery and Eco Products visit our website www.skipzrecycling.com.au Let us make a commitment for good ‚Äì together we can make a healthier planet and brighter future. #generationrestoration #worldenvironmentday2024 #worldenvironmentday2024 #sustainability #sustainable #wastemanagement #skipzrecycling #recycling #takeaction #environmental #constructionwaste #skipbins #skipbinsmelbourne #skipbinsbrisbane #hookbins #marrelbins #recyclingmatters #melbourne #brisbane

üåø Clean Biz Spotlight: Our Journey Towards Sustainability üåø At Citadel Completions, we are proud to be part of the Clean Biz Partnership initiative by Keep Louisiana Beautiful. We are committed to maintaining a litter-free and clean environment within our facility as part of our broader sustainability efforts. Our dedication to sustainability is not limited to cleanliness. We consciously strive to contribute positively to the environment, as we believe businesses play a critical role in environmental stewardship. This commitment resonates deeply with our core values and our dedication to serving our community better. We consider this a testament to our commitment to eco-friendly practices, and it's just the beginning. We hope our actions inspire others in the business community to adopt greener, cleaner practices because every step counts in preserving our environment.üåç ‚ôª üçÉ We invite you to learn more about our efforts and join us on this journey towards a sustainable future. üëâ Citadel Completions - Clean Biz Spotlight link below! üåç #CitadelCompletions #KeepLouisianaBeautiful #CleanBiz #EcoFriendlyBusiness #Sustainability #eco #teamcitadel #reducereuserecycle #aviation #aviationindustry

In 2011, I was going through a recycling kick at home. I was so proud to be able to increase the blue bag to black bag ratio each collection day. I started driving roll off at Fenceline Rentals Ltd., and was so discouraged driving around, putting 40y bins into the landfill, not to mention the 3-5 other companies there doing the same thing every time I was there. But‚Ä¶ I realized I could take a bin that was half wood on its way to the landfill, and send it to the mixed wood program at Northlands Transfer station. This easy and independent decision kept a years worth of blue bags out of the ground, and saved the company money. It was also a game changer in my mindset of the effect I could have as a driver, much less a salesmen or sales leader. Needless to say, I couldn‚Äôt be more proud of Fenceline Rentals Ltd. stats mentioned below. Especially when you consider that this only includes registered LEED projects, if you factored in the Recycle Tracking programs we have in place with partners like Chandos Construction, Fillmore Construction, Leeswood Construction and Keller Construction Ltd.! These numbers would easily be 3-5x higher! Thank you Jasen Robalo and Rob W. Sherrard for your dedication to accumulating the knowledge and consistency in execution that allows stats like this to be possible. Here‚Äôs to many more successful LEED and Recycle Tracking projects!

Are you a company committed to making a step-change in your environmental initiatives? If so, read on. What is YBC's pledge? To build a more sustainable future, one eco-friendly crossing at a time. That's where a partnership with York Bridge Concepts comes in! Our expertise in crafting eco-friendly timber crossings aligns perfectly with your vision for a greener, more sustainable tomorrow. With York Bridge Concepts by your side, you will step into a new era of responsible construction, reducing your carbon footprint and preserving the environment compared to other materials. Together, we're building bridges ‚Äì not just between places but also towards a brighter, eco-conscious future. Get Started Today: https://hubs.la/Q024MwC-0 #SustainabilityRevolution #EcoFriendlyPartnership #YorkBridgeConcepts #GreenInitiatives

üåçüíö Happy Earth Day from J Sweet Construction! üíöüåç Today, we celebrate our planet and reaffirm our commitment to building a more sustainable future. At J Sweet Construction, we are proud to integrate eco-friendly practices into our projects and business philosophy. We believe in the importance of preserving our environment for future generations and are committed to reducing our carbon footprint, one project at a time. This Earth Day, we‚Äôre excited to share some of the steps we've taken towards sustainability: üå± Using recycled materials in our constructions wherever possible. üåû Incorporating energy-efficient technologies to reduce energy consumption. üíß Implementing water-saving techniques to conserve this vital resource. We encourage everyone to join us in making small changes that can make a big difference. Whether it‚Äôs recycling more, reducing energy use, or planting a tree, every action counts! Let's work together to make every day Earth Day. üåèüå±‚ú® #EarthDay #Sustainability #EcoFriendlyConstruction #JSweetConstruction #GoGreen
